title: #10 - Sodapoppin Talks Worst Gambling Debts and Crazy Fan Encounters
itunes:title: #10 - Sodapoppin Talks Worst Gambling Debts and Crazy Fan Encounters
description: On this episode of The CouRage and Nadeshot Show presented by Cash App, CouRage and Nadeshot go mobile at TwitchCon in this special episode featuring Sodapoppin. They talk about the Classic World of Warcraft craze, gambling on stream, destroying Dr. Disrespect in H1Z1, and much more.
content:encoded: On this episode of The CouRage and Nadeshot Show presented by Cash App, CouRage and Nadeshot go mobile at TwitchCon in this special episode featuring Sodapoppin. They talk about the Classic World of Warcraft craze, gambling on stream, destroying Dr. Disrespect in H1Z1, and much more.
